recommendations: Tianna Tagami
Learning Design and Evaluation Consultant
April 26, 2010, Tianna was a client of Dani’s

I have worked with Dani as an audio producer. Dani always sends me top-notch talent, especially child talent. Her kids are professional and always eager to learn and improve their craft. I know I can call Dani with the vaguest of casting requirements and she will put together the perfect group of submissions. She is the first person I call when I need to cast voice over talent, and I do not hesitate to recommend her and her agency.

Co-owner at Still 'n Motion Picture Co
June 1, 2009, Nancy worked with Dani but at different companies

I have worked closely with Dani for more that 20 years sculpting images for her talent that best market their abilities and visuals.  As team players, Dani, Misti &  Bill are highly productive, creative, and  progressive.  Each with their own skill set, they compliment each other with the final result far above the bar.  The agency has a reputation for it's honesty, integrity and loyalty to her clients and talent.  She gives graciously her time and energy to all of the committee's that she was elected to which promote the Film and Commercial Industry.  She is a great role model for women who may choose her same path and for me a friend like no other.
Nancy Hall

I have known Nancy Hall and Earl Smith for over 20 years and it was their work that brought us together. The quality of their work was amazing and I wanted to meet them. Once I had the pleasure of meeting them, there was no doubt that I would recommend everyone I represent to be shot by Still 'n Motion. They make the talent feel comfortable and they really know how to capture the shot. I love them and recommend them highly.

summary: I look forward to 2017 being a great year! Business has been on a steady uprise since 2011! And already January has started off with a bang! With Arizona's best weather almost 350 days out of the year, makes Arizona a great place to shoot. We have amazing actors and voice actors ready to work.
